name: spamhaus-feed
label: Spamhaus Feed
description: Spamhaus Feed provides access to expansive threat data and related information. This connector facilitates automated operations related to fetching the list of IPs blocklist. \nThis connector has a dependency on the Threat Intel Management Solution Pack. Install the Solution Pack before enabling ingestion of Threat Feeds from this source.

fields.title: Service
fields.name: service
fields.description: Review and select the URL of the Spamhaus Feed service to which you will connect and retrieve data. You can choose between https://www.spamhaus.org/drop/drop.txt or https://www.spamhaus.org/drop/edrop.txt.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.

operations.description: Retrieves a list of all indicators from Spamhaus Feed.
operations.title: Fetch Indicators

parameters.title: Process response as
parameters.name: output_mode
options: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.tooltip: Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being created as "Feed records" in FortiSOAR (the Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR option) or data being returned in the JSON format (the Return as a JSON option).
parameters.description: Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being created as "Feed records" in FortiSOAR (the Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR option) or data being returned in the JSON format (the Return as a JSON option).

Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.title: Record Creation Playbook IRI
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.description: If you choose the 'Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR' option, then in the Record Creation Playbook IRI field, specify the IRI of the playbook that creates feed records in FortiSOAR.
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.name: create_pb_id
